keyword: in n out protein style calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger
meta_description: Learn in n out protein style calories: about 240 kcal per burger with high protein, low carbs, plus full nutrition breakdown and tweaks.
h1: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger
assumptions: Standard single patty hamburger in lettuce wrap with tomato, onion, spread; no bun, no cheese; values from In-N-Out nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and portion sizes. Check In-N-Out app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out Protein Style burger delivers ~240 kcal and 13 g protein with minimal carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in In-N-Out Protein Style?
faqs.a: Approximately 240 kcal for the standard single patty version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in In-N-Out Protein Style?
faqs.a: About 13 g of protein per burger, mainly from the beef patty.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out Protein Style burgers low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, only 4 g total carbs due to no bun, just veggies.

faqs.q: How does Protein Style compare to regular In-N-Out burger calories?
faqs.a: Protein Style saves ~200-300 kcal by skipping the bun.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in In-N-Out Protein Style?
faqs.a: Around 650 mg, mostly from the spread and seasoning.
